# MTLFeatureSet.tvOS_GPUFamily2_v2

**Case**

The GPU family 2, version 2 feature set for tvOS.

## Declaration

```swift
case tvOS_GPUFamily2_v2
```

## Discussion

This feature set corresponds with Apple A10 devices running tvOS 12.

## tvOS GPU family 2

- **MTLFeatureSet.tvOS_GPUFamily2_v1**: The GPU family 2, version 1 feature set for tvOS.
